name: Black Cube
description:
You control a black cube which needs to hit the red cubes also this is my first game jam.

The quality is by default set to Low in the web version (the cubes don't crumble).

Controls:

You can choose your own controls in the setup, it only supports keyboard buttons.

How to play?

-Avoid other black cubes

-Jump over black walls

-Hit the red cubes

Objective:

 Hit as many cubes as you can!
